name: Meown To Earth I Go
description:
Meown to Earth I Go by the TeamOfThree

[Oculus Quest]

You are a traveling space cat, in your HoverCat spaceship. There appears to be an ecological disaster on the near by planet of earth. Shapes are appearing  all over the earth. Since you happen to be in the area, you decide to try to help out. Beam down to the planet and remove as many of these shapes as possible. Combine three of the same colour as many times as you can to boost your standing with the humans before your time on earth depletes.

Created By:

Ben Dunn (ben.matt.dunn@gmail.com)

Pieter Kirkham (reflection.rip@gmail.com)

Robert Regner (rj.regner@gmail.com)

Used Assets

  • CGI Moon Kit (Texture) by Nasa svs.gsfc.nasa.gov/4720
  • Earth (Texture) by Tom Patterson, www.shadedrelief.com
  • Mobile Starter Content by Epic Games (epicgames.com)
  • Modular Seaside Town by Matima Studio ( www.matima-studio.com/)
  • Soul Caves by Epic Games (epicgames.com)
  • Virtual Reality Content Examples by Epic Games (epicgames.com)
  • Virtual Reality & Virtual Reality BP by Epic Games (epicgames.com)
  • Yarn ball (Model Editted), created by Marcosninja
  • Fare War by Triune Films LLC (www.triunedigital.com), licensed use. 
  • Smash and Grab by Triune Films LLC (www.triunedigital.com), licensed use.
  • Submarine by Triune Films LLC (www.triunedigital.com), licensed use.

How To Play:

Using the Oculus controllers, touch 3 objects of the same color. Continue matching 3 for higher combo bonuses. If you fail to match 3 you will loose your combo bonus, so be careful. Get the yarn for bigger scores. Use the thumb grips/pads to move around, both for an extra speed boost, but watch out for dizziness!
